Title: Afri-Comics
Summary: Afri-Comics were published in 1975-1977 as part of a “five-year secret propaganda war” led by Eschel Rhoodie, Secretary of the Department of Information in the South African government from 1972 until 1977, to defend apartheid. https://idep.library.ucla.edu/afri-comics
